sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Psychic Chat POC. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our platform. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and otherwise process your personal information. We comply with GDPR, CCPA, PIPEDA, and LGPD regulations.

sections.title: 2. What Personal Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly (name, email, password, birth information for astrology), information we collect automatically (IP address, device type, browser information, usage data), and information from third parties (geolocation services, payment processors).

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your information to: Provide and maintain the Service; Process transactions; Send service-related announcements; Improve and personalize the Service; Comply with legal obligations; Prevent fraud and ensure security.

sections.title: 4. Data Retention
sections.content: Personal profile information is retained until account deletion. Chat messages are deleted 30 days after account closure. Session tokens expire in 24 hours. When you delete your account, your data is anonymized within 30 days and permanently deleted after 2 years. Consent records are retained indefinitely for legal compliance.

sections.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
sections.content: You have the right to: Access all personal data we hold about you; Correct inaccurate information; Request deletion of your data (Right to be Forgotten); Export your data in portable format; Object to data processing. To exercise these rights, contact privacy@starshippsychics.com or use the Download My Data or Delete My Account features in your account settings.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: All personal information is encrypted using AES-256 encryption at rest and HTTPS/TLS 1.3 in transit. We use bcrypt password hashing, JWT authentication with 24-hour expiration, IP logging for sensitive actions, and maintain comprehensive audit trails. Access is restricted to authorized personnel only.

sections.title: 7. How We Share Your Data
sections.content: We do NOT sell your data. We do NOT share with advertisers or marketing companies. We MAY share with service providers (Railway.app, PostgreSQL, Redis) under Data Processing Agreements. We may share when legally required (law enforcement, subpoena). We only share with your explicit consent.

sections.title: 8. Cookies & Tracking
sections.content: We use functional cookies (authentication, session persistence) and preference cookies (theme, language selection). These cookies help provide the Service. You can manage cookies through your browser settings. We do not currently use Google Analytics tracking.

sections.title: 9. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our Service is for adults 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If we discover a child has created an account, we will immediately delete all data and notify the parent/guardian.

sections.title: 10. Data Breach Notification
sections.content: In the event of a data breach, we will investigate immediately, contain the breach, notify regulators within 72 hours (GDPR requirement), and notify you within 72 hours if there is risk to your rights and freedoms. You will receive email notification with details of what happened and steps you should take.

sections.title: 11. International Data Transfers
sections.content: Your information may be transferred to and stored in the United States. For EU residents, we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) for data transfers. For Canadian residents, we follow PIPEDA-compliant transfer agreements. For Brazilian residents, we follow LGPD-compliant agreements.

sections.title: 12. Contact Information
sections.content: For privacy questions or to exercise your rights, contact: Email: privacy@starshippsychics.com; Mailing Address: Starship Psychics, PO Box 13, Wimberley, TX 78676; Response Time: Within 30 days (or as required by law).

sections.title: 13. Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or respond to legal requirements. We will notify you of material changes via email and in-app notice. Continued use of the Service after updates means you accept the changes.
